summary: Refactored Socket_simple_http_request by extracting request building and execution logic into a separate build_and_execute_request() helper function. Reduced main function from 100 lines to 35 lines while maintaining identical functionality and all exception handling paths.

new_functions: build_and_execute_request() - static helper for request building and execution with comprehensive exception handling
refactored_functions: Socket_simple_http_request() - simplified to focus on validation, client lifecycle, and response conversion
changes.complexity_improvement: Reduced cognitive complexity by separating concerns into focused functions
